import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Card, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Dropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FaDollarSign } from 'react-icons/fa' import Rating from '../Rating' // import products from '../../products' const ProductScreen = ({match, history, location}) => { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]); const {image, name, rating, numReviews, price, description, countInStock} = product; const StocksCount = []; let x = 0; for(x = 0 ; x <= countInStock; x++){ StocksCount.push(`${x + 1}`) } useEffect(() => { const fetchProduct = async () => { const result = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/v1/products/${match.params.id}`, { method: 'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }) const {Data} = await result.json(); setProduct(data); } fetchProduct(); }, [match]) return ( <>

{name}
Price: {price}
 Description: {description} Price: {price} Status: {countInStock > 0 ? `In Stock` : `Out of Stock`} Quantity: Dropdown Button {StocksCount.map(num => ( {num} ))} ) } export default ProductScreen
